description: Domain ontology for knowledge-graph entity extraction. Customise entity_types per research domain; patterns are optional regex rules used only by the 'rule' strategy.

LOCATION.label: geographic location or geological structure
LOCATION.description: Geographic locations, regions, geological structures, habitats

ORGANISM.label: organism, species, or biological taxon
ORGANISM.description: Species, organisms, biological taxa including Latin binomial names

PHENOMENON.label: natural phenomenon or biological process
PHENOMENON.description: Natural phenomena, biological or chemical processes, geological events

SUBSTANCE.label: chemical substance, compound, or material
SUBSTANCE.description: Chemical substances, compounds, elements, materials, minerals

METHOD.label: research method, instrument, or technique
METHOD.description: Research methods, instruments, experimental techniques, analysis tools

CONCEPT.label: scientific concept, theory, or model
CONCEPT.description: Theories, models, principles, key domain terms
